 to NOW TV

NOW TV is a streaming service that allows you to watch live and on-demand content from your favorite TV channels, movies, and sports events. Unlike other streaming services, NOW TV does not require a contract, so you can choose to cancel or pause it anytime you want. This article will walk you through everything you need to know about NOW TV, so keep reading to learn more.

## Getting Started with NOW TV

To start using NOW TV, you need to sign up for an account and choose a package. The packages available on NOW TV are Movies, Entertainment, Sports, and Kids. Each package is priced at a different rate, so you can choose the one that suits your budget and preference.

Once you have chosen your package, you need to download the NOW TV app on your device to access the content. You can download the app on any device, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and Smart TVs.

## NOW TV Features

NOW TV comes with a range of features that make it stand out from other streaming services. These features include:

### Live TV

NOW TV allows you to stream live TV from channels such as Sky Sports, Sky Cinema, Comedy Central, MTV, and more. This means that you can catch up on your favorite shows as they air.

### On-Demand TV

In addition to live TV, NOW TV also offers on-demand TV shows and movies. This feature allows you to watch your favorite shows and movies at your own convenience.

### HD Streaming

NOW TV allows you to stream content in HD quality. This means that you can enjoy a high-quality viewing experience without any interruptions or buffering.

### Multiple Devices

With NOW TV, you can watch content on up to four different devices at the same time. This means that you can share your account with family members or friends without any additional cost.

## NOW TV Pricing

NOW TV offers flexible pricing options to suit your budget and preference. The prices for each package are as follows:

- Movies: £11.99/month
- Entertainment: £9.99/month
- Sports: £33.99/month
- Kids: £3.99/month

However, NOW TV also offers daily, weekly, and monthly passes for each package. This means that you can choose to pay only for the days or weeks that you want to watch content.

## Conclusion

In conclusion, NOW TV is a great streaming service that offers a range of features and pricing options. Its flexibility allows you to customize your viewing experience and cancel or pause it anytime you want. So, if you are looking for a hassle-free streaming service with great content, NOW TV is definitely worth a try.
